title: Vinnie Goodwill on NBA Playoff Officiating, Warriors-Grizzlies, Suns-Mavericks
description:
Bomani Jones is joined by Vincent Goodwill of Yahoo! Sports to discuss what he is seeing across the NBA Playoffs, including controversial officiating decisions in Warriors-Grizzlies (6:50) and Suns-Mavericks (25:45), as well as which players make up the group that will lead the league into the next generation (28:12).
